projects.name: Taskly
projects.summary: Taskly is a side project developed to enhance my React skills and progress in TypeScript. It combines complexity and versatility, offering a robust platform to manage collaborative projects efficiently.
features: Authentication: Secure user login and management of personal boards.
User Collaboration: Board creators can invite users to collaborate on projects.
Board and List Management: Create, edit, and organize boards and task lists for seamless workflow.
Task Features: Add, modify, assign, and set deadlines for tasks, with drag-and-drop functionality.
Enhanced Collaboration: Task comments and user assignments to improve team communication.

projects.name: Bento-running
projects.summary: This was my first project using Next.js and TypeScript, driven by my passion for running. It leverages the Strava API to display user performance data in a clear and organized way with a Bento design approach for structured elements.
features: User Authentication: OAuth authentication implemented with NextAuth.
Data Visualization: Informative performance charts created using Recharts.
Interactive Maps: React-Leaflet integrated with Google Maps tiles for enhanced user interaction.
Bento Design: A clean and structured layout for intuitive data presentation.

works.summary: Development of a web platform designed for trainers to efficiently manage their training sessions and engage with students. Collaborated with two developers, overseeing development progress and validating Pull Requests.
features: Trainer Dashboard: Create and manage training packs, customize the homepage, update availability, and communicate with students.
Student Portal: Schedule meetings with admins (email confirmation + Google Meet integration), purchase training packs via Stripe, and upload resumes.
Interactive Tools: Personalized profiles, dedicated messaging, quizzes, and CV feedback.
Document Management: Import and share training materials seamlessly.

works.summary: Development and design of a front-end portal providing clients with a comprehensive view of their assets. Focused on intuitive data display and effective filtering to highlight key insights.
features: Asset Management: Centralized overview and management of client assets.
Monitoring: Real-time updates on asset performance and status.
Reporting: Generation of detailed and customizable reports.
Data Filtering: Advanced tools to sort and focus on relevant information.
User-friendly Interface: Streamlined navigation for quick access to important data.
